name: GravityRoyale
description:
IMPORTANCE use ` (backtick) to use unreal terminal:

You can type exit, restart or open level.

Key Mapping:
  • Left Click  - Shots projectile
  • Q - Launch Rope if contacted Planet / Remove Rope
  • Space - Jump / Launch to target Rope.
Map Available
  • TestMap
Multiplayer (Local Network Only / in same Wifi)
  1. You should know your IP address in local network. For Windows type 'ipconfig' in command line.
  2. Open Game.
  3. Open unreal terminal using backtick:
    1. Host, type `open TestLevel?listen`
    2. Client (who to join the host), type `open hostIP:7777`
      1. Example for client: `open 192.168.1.12:7777`
  4. Restart game Host type `RestartLevel` in unreal terminal.
Purpose

I need your feedback, i want make this game success in the future.This game would update once a month. If you like it, please donate me :3
